qustion: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?
The more of me you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
What has keys but can't open locks?
What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?
What number comes next in the sequence: 1, 11, 21, 1211, 111221?
I’m tall when I’m young, and I’m short when I’m old. What am I?
What is always in front of you but can’t be seen?
What has one eye but can’t see?
If two’s company and three’s a crowd, what are four and five?
If you have me, you want to share me. If you share me, you don’t have me. What am I?
I’m found in the sky, but you can also hold me in your hands. What am I?
What has four wheels and flies?
The more you take away, the bigger I get. What am I?
I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The finger I touch, will soon turn red. What am I?
What is so fragile that saying its name breaks it?
What has roots as nobody sees, is taller than trees, up, up it goes, and yet it never grows?
I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
The person who makes it sells it. The person who buys it never uses it. The person who uses it never knows they’re using it. What is it?
What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?
What begins with an ‘E’, but only contains one letter?
